pages.text: 44|19|‘Arau tomaloke allahara biraud'dhe aud'dhatya prakasa nakaraiba, niscaya ma'i tomalokara ocarata spasta pramana lai ahima.
44|20|‘Tomalokara prastaraaghatara paraa ma'i mora pratipalaka arau tomalokara pratipalakara ocarata asraya bicaraicho.
44|21|‘Arau yadi tomaloke mora prati bisbasa sthapana nakaraa, tente moka erai guci yoraa’.
44|22|Tara pichata te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai ka’le, ‘niscaya ihamta eta aparaadhi sampradaya’.
44|23|(Allahe ka’le) ‘tente tumi mora bandasakalaka lai raatira bhitarate ola'i yoraa, niscaya tomalokaka picha phalara paraa khedi yoraa ha’ba’.
44|24|‘Arau sagarakhanaka sthira thakibalai diya, niscaya sihamta ha’ba dubi maraa bahinira antarbhukta’.
44|25|Sihamte pichaphale erai gaichila bahuto udyana arau prasrarana
44|26|sasyaksetra arau suramya basasthana
44|27|arau nana dharanara bilasa-samagrai, ya’ta sihamte ananda upabhoga karaichila.
44|28|Enekuraa'i haichila, arau ami e'i sakaloborara uttaraadhikarai karaichilo eta belega sampradayaka.
44|29|Eteke akasa arau prthiraiye sihamtara babe asraupata karaa nachila arau sihamta arakasa praapta'o nachila.
44|30|Arau arasye ami bani icharaa'ilaka lanchanadayaka sastira paraa ud'dhara karaichilo
44|31|phira'a'unara paraa, niscaya si achila simalanghanakarai sakalara majata sirsasthaniya.
44|32|Arau ami jani bujiye sihamtaka sakalo srstira oparata nirbacita karaichilo.
44|33|Arau ami sihamtaka enekuraa nidarsanarali pradana karaichilo ya’ta achila suspasta paraiksa
44|34|niscaya sihamte (e'i katha sadaye) kai thake
44|35|‘amara prathama mrtyura bahirae ana eko na'i, arau ami ketiya'o punaraut'thita naha'om.
44|36|‘Eteke tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente amara pitr-purausasakalaka lai aha’.
44|37|(Koraacona) sraestha kona, sihamta ne tubba sampradaya, ne sihamtara purbe yisakala achila sihamta? Ami sihamtaka dhbansa karaichilo. Niscaya sihamta achila aparaadhi.
44|38|Akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache iyara ekorae'i ami dhemalira chalerae srsti karaa na'i
44|39|ami e'i duyoke yathayathabharae'i srsti karaicho, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i najane.
